alert.note: Alert for Autauga; Lowndes (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 26 at 9:15PM CDT until March 26 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Autauga County in central Alabama... Lowndes County in south central Alabama... * Until 1015 PM CDT. * At 915 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Burnsville to 10 miles southeast of Belknap, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Prattville, Millbrook, Fort Deposit, Mosses, Hayneville, Autaugaville, White Hall, Gordonville, Lowndesboro, Benton, Booth, Beechwood, Autauga County Airport, Mulberry, Lowndes County Airport, Logan, Calhoun, Robert F. Henry Lock And Dam, Clover Hill and Farmersville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for central, south central and east central Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
